title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource requirements. Establish communication channels and project management processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct user research, stakeholder interviews, and market analysis to understand the needs and requirements for the BionicLimbEnhancer system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, integration with the nervous system, data flow, scalability, security, performance considerations, and ethical implications.

title: Hardware Development
description: Design and develop the physical prosthetic components, including sensors, actuators, and control systems.

title: Software Development
description: Develop the software components for signal processing, control algorithms, and user interfaces.

title: Neural Interface Integration
description: Develop the interface between the BionicLimbEnhancer system and the user's nervous system for seamless control and feedback.

title: Data Management and Security
description: Design and implement secure data storage and transmission mechanisms for user data and system logs.

title: Testing and Validation
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and conduct rigorous testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Regulatory Compliance and Certification
description: Ensure compliance with relevant medical device regulations and obtain necessary certifications for the BionicLimbEnhancer system.

title: Deployment and Support
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the BionicLimbEnhancer system, including installation, user training, and ongoing support.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user manuals, and training materials for the BionicLimbEnhancer system.
